product_name: Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW Sleeping Pad
long_description: With a lofty design this self-inflating Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW sleeping pad is one of the thickest pads out there with about 4 in. of padding for dreamy refuge from the cold, hard ground. Laminated polyester surface fabric is durable, airtight and humidity resistant; nonslip finish keeps you on the pad. Uses high-grade open-cell polyurethane foam for efficient warmth. Features 2 wide, low-profile, FlatValves for inflation and deflation; pad self-inflates, but to top off, inflate easily with a few hearty breaths. Intake valve features a built-in flap to prevent air escaping when inflating; flap can be released to let a little air out when finding that ideal comfort zone. Both edges of mat feature rip-and-stick strips so can you attach another mat or 2. High-frequency welded seams create airtight construction. Includes stuff sack for protection during transportation. The Exped SIM Comfort 10 LW sleeping pad includes repair kit with adhesive and fabric patches. SIM = Self Inflating Mat; LW = Long Wide.
